pages.text: $(marked)Crystal Protection$() is a special spell.$(br)It will cover its user with hard crystals, which are sustained by Magan.$(br2)The effect will prevent all damage to have full effect, and will instead decrease it to the least amount.
Each time the protected target is hit, the effect's duration will decrease, and Magan will be consumed.$(br)If either the effect ends, or the Magan drops to zero, no damage will be absorbed.
